title: AdaChain: A Learned Adaptive Blockchain
abstract:
This paper presents
 AdaChain
 , a learning-based blockchain framework that adaptively chooses the best permissioned blockchain architecture to optimize effective throughput for dynamic transaction workloads. AdaChain addresses the challenge in Blockchain-as-a-Service (BaaS) environments, where a large variety of possible smart contracts are deployed with different workload characteristics. AdaChain supports automatically adapting to an underlying, dynamically changing workload through the use of reinforcement learning. When a promising architecture is identified, AdaChain switches from the current architecture to the promising one at runtime in a secure and correct manner. Experimentally, we show that AdaChain can converge quickly to optimal architectures under changing workloads and significantly outperform fixed architectures in terms of the number of successfully committed transactions, all while incurring low additional overhead.
tldr_ja: AdaChainは、動的なトランザクション負荷に最適な許可型ブロックチェーンアーキテクチャを自動的に選択する学習ベースのフレームワークです。強化学習を用いて、変化する負荷に適応し、実行中に最適なアーキテクチャに切り替えます。実験結果では、固定アーキテクチャと比較して、成功したトランザクション数が大幅に向上し、低いオーバーヘッドで迅速に最適化されることが示されています。
